entry.data:
CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 50
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 20
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
